00009   struct EllipticResult 
00010   {
00011     // Default constructor
00012     EllipticResult(): _request(0), _energy(0.0) {};
00013 
00014     // Return NumMat and PbDoF
00015     virtual int getNumMatProp() = 0;
00016     virtual int getPbDoF() = 0;
00017 
00018     // Virtual functions to set Elliptic results members (e.g. to be used in the EllipticModel compute function)
00019     virtual void setRequest(int request) { _request = request; };
00020     virtual void setEnergy(Real energy) {_energy = energy; };
00021     virtual void setResidual(int ind, Real value) = 0;
00022 
00023     // Reset function
00024     virtual void resetResidualToZero() = 0;
00025     virtual void resetStiffnessToZero() = 0;
00026     virtual void resetGradgToZero() = 0;
00027     virtual void resetHgToZero() = 0;
00028     
00029     // Virtual functions to add to Elliptic result members
00030     virtual void addEnergy(Real DeltaEnergy) {_energy += DeltaEnergy; };
00031     virtual void addResidual(int ind, Real value) = 0;
00032     virtual void addStiffness(int indRow, int indCol, Real value) = 0;
00033     virtual void FinalizeGlobalStiffnessAssembly() = 0;
00034     virtual void setStiffnessFromTriplets(vector<Triplet<Real > > &) = 0;
00035 
00036     virtual void addGradg(int ind, Real value) = 0;
00037     virtual void addHg(int indRow, int indCol, Real value) = 0;
00038     virtual void setHgFromTriplets(vector<Triplet<Real > > &) = 0;
00039 
00040     // Virtual functions to get Elliptic result members
00041     virtual int  getRequest() {return _request; };
00042     virtual Real getEnergy()  {return _energy; };
00043     virtual Real getResidual(int ind) = 0;
00044     virtual Real getStiffness(int indRow, int indCol) = 0;
00045     virtual Real getGradg(int ind) = 0;
00046     virtual Real getHg(int indRow, int indCol) = 0;
00047 
00048   private:
00049     int  _request;
00050     Real _energy;
